name: ls
description: Function call mimicking UNIX ls. Extract directory path from user query. Don't ever modify the name of this function.

path.description: Directory path. On function call, prepend ll/ to this identified path. Every final file path must begin with ll/

name: cat
description: Function call mimicking UNIX cat. Extract file path from user query. User can use terms like 'show', 'display', etc. to trigger the cat command. Don't every modify the name of this function.

path.description: File path. On function call, prepend ll/ to this identified path. Every final file path must begin with ll/
